column5: This will be my first time going to Canada so what do you guys recomend for bait?
This will be my first time going to Canada so what do you guys recomend for bait?
Crawlers, minnows, leeches, plastics or cranks. That's about it.
Crawlers, minnows, leeches, plastics or cranks. That's about it.

Leeches worked pretty good last week, northeast of Lac Suel(sp?), in stained water, but $40.00 per pound was a little pricey. plastics worked a little better that cranks. good luck, if you hit it right it won't matter.
crawlers and leaches work well. as for plastics, we use gulp leeches and worms and also the powerbait power grub in pumpkinseed color. that caught our biggest fish last week at lac des mille lacs.
